rooms.description: Large open space with Vastu-aligned seating area and natural lighting.
Adjacent to the living room for easy movement; designed with minimalistic decor adhering to Indian design aesthetics.
Modern kitchen layout optimized for efficiency and safety, aligned per Vastu principles with south-eastern exposure.
Master bedroom located in the north-west sector as per Vastu recommendations; includes walk-in closet and attached bathroom.
Second bedroom designed with emphasis on privacy and ventilation; placed according to Vastu guidelines in the east.
Third bedroom, integrated into a multi-functional space that can serve as guest quarters if needed; positioned per Vastu recommendations for balanced energy flow.
Fourth bedroom offering additional private space; situated in the south-west area to optimize relaxation and calm.
Fifth bedroom with adjoining study/work nook; designed for a home office setup and flexible use following Vastu principles in the north-east sector.
Primary bathroom adjacent to master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort; includes fixtures and proper ventilation.
Secondary bathroom serving the common areas of ground floor.

openings.description: Large entrance door oriented to the north to welcome positive energy as per Vastu principles, with an adjoining foyer.
Multiple windows strategically placed to ensure ample natural light and ventilation; includes operable casement windows for effective cross-breezes.
